Flavor Text: The purity of your faith can deflect swords

Flavor Text: One strike from the shadows is all it takes

Flavor Text: A berserk rage wreaks uncontrollable havok

Flavor Text: You fuel your abilities with your lifeblood

Name: Cutpurse

Name: Disenchant

Flavor Text: Empower an ally's weapon to deal arcane damage

Flavor Text: Tap a deep reserve of determination to heal

Name: Escape
Flavor Text: Sometimes it's just better to avoid the fight

Name: Evasion
Description: Increase own evasion for a round

Name: First Aid
Flavor Text: A small, mana-efficient healing ability

Name: Focus
Flavor Text: Gathering focus leads to powerful action

Name: Grand Theft

Name: Guard

Name: Hide
